com.aurel.track.lucene.index.associatedFields

Interface IAssociatedFieldsIndexer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILookupFieldIndexer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAssociatedFieldIndexer, AttachmentIndexer, BudgetPlanIndexer, ExpenseIndexer, LinkIndexer

    public interface IAssociatedFieldsIndexer
extends ILookupFieldIndexer
    Base interface for associated lucene indexer fields: attachments, link descriptions, expense descriptions, budget/plan descriptions The workItemID is foreign key in the tables indexed here
